text:
e="preserve">Jaromír Kohlíček (February 23, 1953 – December 6, 2020) was a Czech politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament for the Communist Party of Bohemia and Moravia from 2004 to 2019. He was born in Teplice. From 1998 to 2004, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of the Czech Republic.
Kohlíček died on December 6, 2020 at the age of 67.

annotations.surface_form: Communist Party of Bohemia and Moravia
Chamber of Deputies of the Czech Republic
